pages.text: The Woot factory runs on Conatus Fluid, which is primarily generated with the $(item)Fluid Vat$(0). The machine takes a fluid and a catalyst, then converts that into Conatus Fluid. Different fluid/catalyst combinations give differing amounts on Conatus Fluid.
Items can be inserted from any side. Input fluids can be inserted from the left, top or front. Output fluids can be removed from the bottom, back and right sides.
